name: Koi Koi Assault
description:
Madam Koi Koi was a teacher in a secondary school known for her beauty and her red heels. She lost her job when she was accused of slapping a student. On her way home, she died in a  tragic car accident but before she died she swore to get her revenge on both the school and its students. Now she's back haunting the school and she's turning everyone into her minions, one person at a time.

Wield your cutlass. Collect Milo or Milk and fight your way through. But careful no one is really human anymore.

The game is more like an arcade game just try and beat both your high score and best time.

This was my first game jam. Hope you have fun and enjoy it.

Controls

WASD - Movement.

Left-Shift- Spring/Run.

Spacebar- Jump.

Left Mouse Button- Attack

Left Control - Crouch + Attack

Shift + Movement - Air Dash-ish

Power-ups.

Milo - Slow Time

Milk - Damage Boost

Total of 6 levels.

P.s  Everything except the timer is affected by randomness including how power-ups drop. And it's rather short at that.

EDIT: Temporarily took it down and had to remove screen-shake but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless
